content: If class breaks at 3:55 and the quiz starts at 4:00, for those of us that have to go to a different room for the quiz, will there be leeway in having sufficient quiz time? The announcement says that the quiz ends at 4:25, so we are already starting off with less time than before. Thanks!
subject: How to get to 34-101 in time for MQ3?

content: Yes there will be an allowance made for those in 34-101. Essentially, everyone will get their 25 minutes. Your instructor in that room will let you know when to begin the quiz.
